p: SBP has known antimicrobial activity against numerous microorganisms. SBP extracts have displayed potent broad-spectrum antimicrobial activity against Gram-positive bacterial ( S. aureus, Enterococcus faecalis, M. luteus, Streptococcus mutans and B. subtilis), Gram-negative bacterial ( E. coli and Pseudomonas aeruginosa), and yeast ( Cryptococcus neoformans and C. albicans), either significantly stronger or equivalent to standard antibiotics [ 88, 96, 98, 104, 112, 114, 116].
